INSERT INTO user(user_id, login_id, password, nickname, name, email, phone) VALUES(#{userId}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})

MERGE INTO EMAIL_VERIFICATION t USING (SELECT #{email} AS email FROM dual) s ON (t.email = s.email) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.verification_code = #{verificationCode}, t.expires_at = #{expiresAt}, t.is_verified = #{isVerified} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (email, verification_code, expires_at, is_verified) VALUES (#{email}, #{verificationCode}, #{expiresAt}, #{isVerified})
